manPowerSupply.title: Man Power Supply
manPowerSupply.description: Managing many people could be burdensome to your company. We provide man power supply (Professional Employer Organization) that helps fulfill workforce requirement with less workload. We will be in charge of managing the workforce while you align their goals according to your business productivity.

humanResource.title: Human Resource
humanResource.description: Comprehensive HR solutions to optimize your human capital and drive organizational excellence through strategic talent management and development.

headhunting.title: Talent Headhunting
headhunting.description: Talented employees will ease you in achieving company goals. We help you find talents that you need with our extended experience in talent seeking. Just simply tell us the specification and requirement, then we will give you a shortlist of potential talent that you can hire.

hrDevelopment.title: HR Development
hrDevelopment.description: Investing in good employees will benefit your company in mid-long term. We assist you in making the strategy to develop your Human Resources and implementing the strategy through training and courses that they need.

hrAdministration.title: HR Administration
hrAdministration.description: Doing administrative works and applying permits need loads of energy and time. We will reduce the burden you had by taking over the job and you can use the energy to push the company forward.

bpo.title: BPO - Business Process Outsourcing
bpo.description: Streamline your business operations by outsourcing non-core HR processes to us. We handle the complexities so you can focus on growing your business.

payroll.title: Payroll Services
payroll.description: Eliminate error risk by using our payroll services. We will not only help you calculate the salary, we also help you manage the insurance and local regulation (BPJS). In addition, we will provide assistance to apply reimbursement to insurance & BPJS if needed.

timeAttendance.title: Time & Attendance
timeAttendance.description: Improve your company productivity by using our services. We will apply time & attendance system that suits your company needs and condition. The benefit of our services is the integration of time & attendance system with our online platform, allowing us to monitor our employee status in real time.
